duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of analysts to execute on key performance indicators and projects that support customer renewal activities.
Manage quoting analysts responsible for quote creation and revision, and ensure compliance with company policies for quoting of renewal orders.
Establish and maintain relationships with team leads of adjacent functions to develop and streamline processes.
Drive effectiveness by identifying improvements to the quoting processes and tools, and ensuring achievement of on-time, accurate, and actionable renewal quote creation.
Ensure renewal pricing follows current policies, rules, and procedures based on configuration of the offering and instance.
Support and provide guidance to renewal quoting analyst team, and establish a regular cadence to ensure development and progress toward agreed upon career goals and objectives.
Assist with special projects related to the renewal quoting process and function.
Establish relationships with customer renewal data to ensure the product data is properly captured for creation of customer renewal quotes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree, or 5+ years' experience in an Operations, Product, or Specialists role within a B2B organization.
Experience in Customer Success Operations, Contract Creation or Review, or similar role.
Prior experience using Salesforce (or similar CRM) required, familiarity with Gainsight, NetSuite, and Walk-Me desirable.
Exceptional ability to communicate clearly, both verbal and written.
Familiarity with CX (industry and technology) is a bonus.
